b: when someone new in vicinity then play success
when touched then tell cls, tell showcurrency, play sci fi button beep, become untweened next
when starts then become next in 0.5s
when starts then become untweened 1
when told showcurrency then is bankgold = person.gold, become untweened 2
when any state told cls then become untweened 1
when touched and is person.gold >= 400 then tell cls, tell randomgoodie, play sci fi button beep, is person.gold -= 400, become untweened next
when touched and is person.gold < 400 then tell cls, play button beep, tell nogold, become untweened next
when starts then become next in 1.5s
when starts then become untweened 1, tell cls
when told randomgoodie then become next in 0.2, play machine 1
when starts then is goodie = 0
when told randomlarge then become 3 in 0.2, play machine 1
when starts then is goodie = random(1 8), become untweened next
when starts then is goodie = random(11 14), become untweened next
when told randomgoodie then become untweened next
when any state told cls then become untweened 1
when told randomlarge then become untweened next
when told nogold then become untweened next
when any state told cls then become untweened 1
when touched and is person.gold >= 800 then is person.gold -= 800, tell cls, tell randomlarge, play sci fi button beep, become untweened next
when touched and is person.gold < 800 then play button beep, tell cls, tell nogold, become untweened next
when starts then become next in 2s
when starts then become untweened 1
when is goodie != 0 then play machine 11
when is goodie == 1 then emit chocolate bar with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 2 then emit geiger counter with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 3 then emit lil knife with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 4 then emit magic ring with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 5 then emit cookie with 0.1
when is goodie == 6 then emit teddy mouse with 0.1
when is goodie == 11 then emit daedric sword with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 12 then emit teddy cannon with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 13 then emit headset with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 14 then emit backpack with 0.1
when is goodie == 7 then emit thing with 0.1, become untweened next
when is goodie == 8 then emit cookie with 0.1, become untweened next
when starts then is goodie = 0, become untweened 1
